actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Trade Reform Act of 1974 to extend by 26 weeks the period for which workers may receive trade readjustment allowances.

summary.text: Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to extend by 26 weeks the period for which workers eligible for relief from injury caused by import competition may receive trade adjustment allowances.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Trade Reform Act of 1974 to extend by 26 weeks the period for which workers may receive trade readjustment allowances.
